title: Avoidables 6
description: *This is episode 6 in the Avoidables serial. You can download Avoidables 1 for free.*Henry battles with his feelings for Layla. He knows that she feels the same way, but she's keeping him at a distance.The cat rebels bargain with the Perfect government and a truce is agreed, but will Henry be able to face his own fear and finally admit who he is?
author: Rachel Medhurst
